messages.subject: Thanks for the chuckle!
messages.msgSnippet: Hey Kim, runs with scissors !  When I read that phrase after your name Tuesday, I just cracked up!!  Do you by any chance get the Wireless catalog? They have
messages.messageBody:
Hey Kim, "runs with scissors"! When I read that phrase after your name
Tuesday, I just cracked up!! Do you by any chance get the Wireless catalog?
They have some hysterical t-shirts and sweatshirts, and in fact, have a
shirt that says "Runs with scissors" !! They also have a great father/son
shirt set . The son's says "Chip off the old block" and the dad's says "The
OLD BLOCK". If anyone is interested, there is a web site listed on the
catalog: www.wirelesstoo.com. Thanks for the laugh!
Karen-- still giggling in IND
